channel.title: Really important, servers online playing
channel.description:
Ok. Ive been playing long time with a source server (I dont know if it is called that way. It is the kind of server you need to download...) and im tired of it cause it has always 1 player.. me.
Now I want to start playing in IP servers (owntyou.no-ip.info, lawlscape.no-ip.org, etc.).
The problem is, every time I logg into one, I PLAY LIKE 1 MINUTE AND.... DOWN ! All servers fall !!
I need please, you experienced people, to tell me a server that: - It is mostly ONLINE 24/7 - No lagg
Please! I really need to know...Ive tried logging into sunscape but I cant, says it is down but moparscape.com/serverstatus says its on =( HEEELLP

Dodian.com get the client, play 24\7.

item.title: Really important, servers online playing
item.dc:creator: @a_Terminator a Terminator
item.description:
@a_Terminator wrote:

[quote=“sebaleon, post:1, topic:9741”]Ok. Ive been playing long time with a source server (I dont know if it is called that way. It is the kind of server you need to download…) and im tired of it cause it has always 1 player… me.

Now I want to start playing in IP servers (owntyou.no-ip.info, lawlscape.no-ip.org, etc.).

The problem is, every time I logg into one, I PLAY LIKE 1 MINUTE AND… DOWN !
All servers fall !!

I need please, you experienced people, to tell me a server that:

  • It is mostly ONLINE 24/7
  • No lagg

Please! I really need to know…Ive tried logging into sunscape but I cant, says it is down but moparscape.com/serverstatus says its on =( HEEELLP[/quote]

Go to: RileyScape.No-Ip.Org
